description.narrative: HEALTH,which contributes to Child Health, Child Health (Covid), Immunization, Maternal And Newborn Health. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: New Element

sector.narrative: Maternal and newborn care policy advocacy, evidence generation, national / subnational capacity development
Public health emergencies, including disease outbreaks
Technical assistance - Maternal and newborn health

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
